programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;RT audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o adds.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1 ; add unipolar square to oscil kamp = p4 kcps = 1 itype = 3
klfo lfo kamp, kcps, itype printk2 klfo asig oscil 0.7, 440+klfo, 1 outs asig, asig
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> ;sine wave. f 1 0 32768 10 1
i 1 0 2 1 ;adds 1 Hz to frequency i 1 + 2 10 ;adds 10 Hz to frequency i 1 + 2 220 ;adds 220 Hz to frequency
e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
